item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian, post:8, topic:392201”]if (objectID == 4876 && playerLevel[17] >= 20) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 100000); addSkillXP(1000, 17); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!); } else { sM("You need a Theiving Level of 20 to steal from this stall"); } }

Didn’t add the animation. You can do it yourself.[/quote]

I keep getting 100 errored. Please reply!!

item.title: [Delta] I'll try coding this. but need help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Alright so. I know how to make global objects. I just need help on making the stalls

I want to put my stalls behind the bank facing out. makeGlobalObject(XXXX, XXXX, ####, help with this one, 10);

Also. I want to make it to where you get a certain # of Exp and Gold from the stand

EDIT: This is my new code:

if(objectID == 4876){ TheifStall("General Stall", "And Recieve Some Coins!", 20, 102*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000*playerLevel[17], 0x340); if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 15000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(881);

Now the code I need help with is this line:

I need help on changing the coins, so which # would I change?

Read full topic
